entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
